CustomField.description: TRUE if Balance from NetSuite <> Balance calculated in Salesforce
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Outstanding_Balance_from_NetSuite__c), FALSE, IF( ROUND(Outstanding_Balance_from_NetSuite__c,2) <> ROUND(Outstanding_Bln__c,2), TRUE, FALSE ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TRUE if Balance from NetSuite <> Balance calculated in Salesforce
CustomField.label: Balance mismatch
